conversion_verification.notes: True 3D transformation with consistent wall height and volumetric interior.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection and cutaway treatment; wall geometry is very crisp.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout fidelity; room proportions and adjacencies perfectly match the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is well-placed spatially; kitchen and bathroom fixtures are correctly represented as blocks.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; no text contamination; lighting provides clear readability of spaces.

detected_errors.description: Some door swing details in 3D are simplified compared to the precise 2D arc representation.

summary: An exceptional 3D conversion that maintains high geometric fidelity and structural clarity relative to the original floor plan.
